title: One Piece Eps 375-377
author: One Piece with a Lime
description: A group of One Piece enthusiasts, including two newcomers to the series, discuss episodes 375-377 covering the climactic end of the Thriller Bark arc including the shadow returns, Kuma's arrival, and the famous 'Nothing Happened' moment.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Covers episodes 375-377 including the conclusion of Thriller Bark

title: One Piece Ep. 375 Recap: Not Out of Danger Yet! Orders to Annihilate the Straw Hat Crew
author: The Adult Swim Squad
description: Detailed recap of episode 375 covering the shadow returns, worldwide celebrations, and Kuma's arrival with orders to eliminate the Straw Hats. Rated 4.5/5 Paw Blasts.

title: One Piece Episode 375 Review
author: deculture
description: Contemporary review from 2008 noting the episode was slow in plot progression but featured beautifully animated scenes of Kuma's new technique. Discusses the shadow returns and Kuma's dramatic entrance.

title: One Piece: How Kuma's Past Explains Zoro's Thriller Bark Ordeal
author: Game Rant
description: Analysis article explaining how Kuma's backstory and connection to the Revolutionary Army contextualizes his actions at Thriller Bark, including his testing of Zoro's loyalty and the famous sacrifice scene.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains major spoilers about Kuma's backstory revealed in later arcs

title: One Piece: Why Zoro's Most Badass Moment Still Resonates With Me 19 Years Later
author: Screen Rant
description: Editorial reflecting on the lasting impact of Zoro's sacrifice scene at the end of Thriller Bark, discussing why the 'Nothing Happened' moment remains one of the most iconic in the series after 19 years.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Discusses the conclusion of the Thriller Bark arc through episode 377

title: One Piece Finally Explains Why Kuma Saved the Straw Hats
author: ComicBook.com
description: Article explaining the canonical reasons why Kuma spared the Straw Hats at Thriller Bark, revealed through his backstory in later arcs. Discusses his connection to Dragon, the Revolutionary Army, and his beliefs about Nika.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains major spoilers about Kuma's motivations revealed in Egghead arc and beyond

title: The saddest fact about Zoro's sacrifice in Thriller Bark
author: Dexerto
description: Article discussing the tragic detail that Luffy still doesn't know about Zoro's sacrifice at Thriller Bark and likely never will, examining the emotional weight of this secret.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Discusses Zoro's sacrifice scene from episode 377
